disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Read our disclaimer for important information about our services and responsibilities.

hero.title: Do you have physical or mental complaints?
hero.subtitle: These complaints make your daily life much more difficult. Unnecessarily. We help you get moving again.

benefits.flexibleHours: Also open in the evenings and on weekends

symptoms.title: Do you recognize this?
symptoms.subtitle: Many of our customers come to us with these complaints. Do you recognize yourself in this?

notFeelGood.title: Not feeling well
notFeelGood.description: You don't feel energetic and can't get into your normal rhythm

sleepProblems.title: Sleep problems
sleepProblems.description: You toss and turn at night and can't find a comfortable position

backPain.title: Back pain
backPain.description: Regular back pain that affects your daily activities

sportsInjuries.title: Sports injuries
sportsInjuries.description: You have injuries that hinder you during sports

conclusion.part1: These complaints can significantly affect your daily life.
conclusion.part2: We are happy to help you get back in balance.

solution.title: Our treatment method
solution.subtitle: At Praktijk Tielo, we work with simple self-help exercises that help your body return to its natural posture.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description1: Natural movements combined with light touches at specific places make it possible to correct the position of hips, spine, sacrum, and coccyx where necessary.
howItWorks.description2: Restoring the position of the spine and other joints can improve bodily functions in both physical and mental areas.

forWhom.title: Who is it suitable for?
forWhom.description: Our instruction is suitable for people with various complaints and can make a big difference for young and old:

first.title: First treatment (60 min)
first.description: Alignment of the spine, correction of the sacrum and leg length difference.

second.title: Second treatment (60 min)
second.description: Repetition of first treatment plus heat treatment for better blood circulation and anchoring.

followUp.title: Follow-up process
followUp.description: Follow-up appointments after 1, 3, and 6 months to get your body more and more in line.

items.twoTreatments: The first two treatments take place within a few days of each other.
items.selfHelp: You will receive self-help exercises. This keeps you flexible.
items.afterAccident: After a fall or accident, it is advisable to plan two instructions in a row again.
items.preventive: The treatment also fits perfectly into a preventive lifestyle.

usps.title: Why choose Praktijk Tielo?
usps.subtitle: We offer a unique approach that focuses on your personal situation

quickResults.title: Quick and lasting results
quickResults.description: Our treatment method is designed to not only provide quick relief but also achieve long-lasting results

personalApproach.title: Personal approach
personalApproach.description: We look at your specific situation and create a treatment plan that suits you

flexibleHours.title: Flexible opening hours
flexibleHours.description: Also open in the evenings and on weekends by appointment, so you always find a time that fits

cta.subtitle: Join our satisfied customers and start your recovery today. We are happy to help you with a personal approach.

general.title: 1. General
general.content: This website, www.praktijktielo.nl, and the services offered by Praktijk Tielo, are focused on relaxation and well-being. The information on this website is intended for informational purposes only and should not be construed as medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. By visiting this website and using the services of Praktijk Tielo, you agree to the terms as described below.

noMedicalCare.title: 2. No medical care
items: The treatments and services offered by Praktijk Tielo are complementary and focused on relaxation and well-being.
We do not make medical diagnoses and do not treat medical conditions.
The treatments are not a replacement for medical or psychological care. If you have medical or psychological complaints, we advise you to contact a qualified doctor or specialist.
Praktijk Tielo cannot be held liable for decisions you make based on the treatments offered or the information on this website.

resultsLiability.title: 3. Results and liability
items: The results of treatments vary per person. Praktijk Tielo cannot guarantee specific outcomes.
Treatments are intended as support and relaxation and not as a solution for medical or psychological conditions.
Praktijk Tielo is not liable for any direct or indirect damage resulting from the use of our services or information, unless there is intent or gross negligence.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and data protection
items: Praktijk Tielo handles your personal data with care and complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
The information shared during treatments is treated confidentially and will not be provided to third parties without your consent, unless legally required.

customerResponsibility.title: 5. Responsibility of the customer
items: The customer is responsible for providing correct and complete information about their health condition.
The customer always remains responsible for making decisions regarding their health and well-being.

changes.title: 6. Changes and adjustments
items: Praktijk Tielo reserves the right to change this disclaimer and the content of the website at any time without prior notice.
It is your responsibility to regularly check this page for any adjustments.

applicableLaw.title: 7. Applicable law and disputes
items: Dutch law applies to all services and this disclaimer.
Any disputes will be submitted to the competent court in the Netherlands.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this disclaimer, please contact us via:
